body:
Comment 1 by **jimteeuwen**: 
It should be noted that the faulty behaviour does not always occur. For some reason the
original size of the input file matters. For instance, if you add 1 extra byte to the
enclosed gzipbug.html file, the request works without a problem.

I am unsure why this happens as the size requirements seem to vary wildly based on
filetype and have proven unpredictable at best in my tests. Either way, removing the
Content-Length header from the ServeFile function makes all requests succeed.
